description:
Find one at HP - https://lon.tv/atbvd or Amazon - https://lon.tv/9edxi (compensated affiliate links) - HP released a new Chromebook Plus with an Intel Alder Lake devised i3-N305 processor. It's a nice example of good basic computing transportation. See more ChromeOS: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIvs3GR7NXkAI4Dg_cahGcN_ and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s
